div.head: 客忤死
div.div: [appearance of] death from a visitor‘s hostility

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: [appearance of] death from a visitor‘s hostility

sense.def: Abbreviated Designation wu si 忤 死 , [appearance of] death from hostility. Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1 lists: 救卒客忤死方 , “Recipes to rescue from a sudden [appearance of] death from a visitor’s hostility ”.
